gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: UCAR/NCAR - Computational and Information Systems Laboratory (CISL)

gmd:individualName.gco:CharacterString: University Corporation For Atmospheric Research (UCAR):National Center For Atmospheric Research (NCAR):Computational And Information Systems Laboratory (CISL):Data Assimilation Research Section (DAReS)

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: DART is a community facility for ensemble DA developed and maintained by the Data Assimilation Research Section (DAReS) at the National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR). DART provides modelers, observational scientists, and geophysicists with powerful, flexible DA tools that are easy to implement and use and can be customized to support efficient operational DA applications.
